mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.chongwu_yuyue_uuid_number as chongwuYuyueUuidNumber ,a.chongwu_id as chongwuId ,a.yonghu_id as yonghuId ,a.chongwu_yuyue_text as chongwuYuyueText ,a.chongwu_yuyue_yesno_types as chongwuYuyueYesnoTypes ,a.chongwu_yuyue_yesno_text as chongwuYuyueYesnoText ,a.chongwu_yuyue_shenhe_time as chongwuYuyueShenheTime ,a.chongwu_yuyue_time as chongwuYuyueTime ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.create_time as createTime
